title: 27 Disaster Films That Will Make You Glad You’re Just Snowed In
description: Think your snowed-in weekend is bad? These disaster films will make you grateful you’re not facing a killer tornado or a sinking ship! The post 27 Disaster Films That Will Make You Glad You’re Just Snowed In appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Lisa Babick
excerpt: Think your snowed-in weekend is bad? These disaster films will make you grateful you’re not facing a killer tornado or a sinking ship!

Whether it’s a towering tsunami, a killer tornado, or a city-shattering earthquake, disaster films remind us how much worse things could be. While you’re cozied up on the couch, these movies will have you thanking your lucky stars that only you’re facing a few feet of snow outside. With jaw-dropping special effects and nonstop action, this film will have you thanking your lucky stars that your biggest worry is whether the power will go out, not surviving an ice age in L.A.
